name: airiness
content:
airiness noun [U]
(LIGHTNESS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or condition of having a lot of light and space: There is a feeling of airiness here because of the high ceilings. The stadium has a modern design and there's a nice airiness and openness.
the quality of being delicate, as if full of air: She moved with the grace and airiness of a dancer. The performance needed just a touch more airiness.
More examplesFewer examplesWhat the building lacks in light and airiness it makes up for in history.It's a popular picnic spot, and its airiness attracts kite-flyers.The skylight adds some welcome airiness to the room.

airiness noun [U]
(NO SERIOUSNESS)
the state of not showing worry or serious thought: After his trip he had a lighter spirit, a triumphant airiness. The story has an airiness that has little to do with real lives.
